item.title: Intro to Mineralogy
item.description: Introduction to Mineralogy Minerals are defined as naturally occurring solids that have a specific chemical composition and crystal structure. Glossary Chemical Group A minerals chemical group relates to its chemical composition, where minerals are grouped based on the elements they contain.

item.title: Pyrite
item.description: ![[notes/images/Pyrite.png]] Property Value Chemical Group Sulfides Chemical Composition Iron sulfide, FeS2 Crystal System Isometric (cubic) Crystal habit Cubic, faces may be striated, but also frequently octahedral and pyritohedral.
